definitions.definition: The condition, or the degree, of being fertile .
examples: Muckspreading increases the fertility of the soil.

definitions.definition: The birthrate of a population ; the number of live births per 1000 people per year .
The average number of births per woman within a population.

main_definition: ( uncountable ) The condition, or the degree, of being fertile .
secondary_definitions: ( countable ) The birthrate of a population ; the number of live births per 1000 people per year .
The average number of births per woman within a population.
